page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT FATHERS
page.content: Two people in class 3 of West Grimstead School have fathers who are policemen, one is a mechanic and another is a Careers officer.One is a guard for British Rail and another is a chief inspector.The chief inspector works at Edgley Aircraft Limited near Salisbury inspecting the Optica.One father is a wind screen fitter for Silver Screen in Winchester.Another father is a turfer and another is a factory worker.There are two engineers one a Calor gas engineer and the other an Oil rig engineer.One father is a doctor who works at Southampton General Infirmary.There is a farmer who owns Manor farm and another father who works as a builder.
